analysis.description:
BasicToken.CheckRevoke (/unique_chucks/25/0xa5a15c1d1a7662ee6233111fb24609b7edf59901.sol#146-163) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > FINAL_AML_DATE (/unique_chucks/25/0xa5a15c1d1a7662ee6233111fb24609b7edf59901.sol#157-162)

BasicToken.ComputeVestSpend (/unique_chucks/25/0xa5a15c1d1a7662ee6233111fb24609b7edf59901.sol#163-199) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- vestingProgress > vestingDays (/unique_chucks/25/0xa5a15c1d1a7662ee6233111fb24609b7edf59901.sol#172-176)
	- vestingProgress > 0 (/unique_chucks/25/0xa5a15c1d1a7662ee6233111fb24609b7edf59901.sol#178-196)

BasicToken.canSpend (/unique_chucks/25/0xa5a15c1d1a7662ee6233111fb24609b7edf59901.sol#201-255) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- currentTime > PRIME_VESTING_DATE (/unique_chucks/25/0xa5a15c1d1a7662ee6233111fb24609b7edf59901.sol#233-236)

BasicToken.canTake (/unique_chucks/25/0xa5a15c1d1a7662ee6233111fb24609b7edf59901.sol#259-299) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- currentTime > PRIME_VESTING_DATE (/unique_chucks/25/0xa5a15c1d1a7662ee6233111fb24609b7edf59901.sol#293-295)

MEWcoin.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0xa5a15c1d1a7662ee6233111fb24609b7edf59901.sol)
